SELECT sc.score_id, st.student_name, e.exam_name, st.student_uid, sc.student_id, sc.exam_id, format(AVG(sc.score), 2) as avg, SUM(sc.score) as sum, format(STD(sc.score), 2) as std FROM stucms_score AS sc LEFT JOIN stucms_student AS st ON sc.student_id = st.student_id LEFT JOIN stucms_exam AS e ON sc.exam_id = e.exam_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
GROUP BY st.student_id, e.exam_id ORDER BY e.exam_id
